item.title: OpenAI's Restructuring Sets up What Could Be the Biggest IPO Ever
item.description: OpenAI, maker of ChatGPT, has completed its corporate restructuring, positioning the company for what many expect to be the biggest IPO in history.

item.title: Amprius Technologies Signals Electrifying Growth in 2026
item.description: Amprius Technologies is gaining business momentum that will spill over into its stock price, driving it to new all-time highs in 2026.

item.title: Dave Stock: 180% Gain + Q3 Beat = Breakout Setup?
item.description: Dave Inc. is up 180% YTD and still trades at a reasonable valuation, with a P/E of 24 and a lengthy bullish consolidation taking shape.
